item.title: Packages are for everyone
item.description: Like prettier consume configuration in different formats. If we want to implement a script like findup to find a configuration file. We need to consider all the possible formats that other teams may have already used.

item.title: Do somthing on the second render? NO!
item.description: If something is expected to run on the second render when a dependency is changed in useEffect. It’s probably wrong! Instead, try to move useEffect to lower level, and when the dependency is ready, useEffect will run something on it’s first render.
